name: UTICA WATER AND POWER AUTHORITY
sampleDescriptions: Support of the Hydropower Clean Energy Future Act (H.r. 4045) to update and expedite Federal licensing process to support clean, renewable and affordable hydropower. Support of FERC licensing conduit
Support of the Hydropower Clean Energy Future Act (H.r. 4045) to update and expedite Federal licensing process to support clean, renewable and affordable hydropower. Support of FERC licensing conduit
